data.what_is:
All-channels SCRM helps to Target, Attract, And Acquire Customers
It's the first step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that helps companies reach target groups via multi-touchpoints and acquire customers.
Marketing Automation- Deliver More Win-ready Leads To Sales
It's the second step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that helps companies explore high-value potential customers from their fans/members/database.
Full-channels Customer Relationship Management - Building Closed Loop of Data Marketing
It's the third step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that integrates Omni-channel user data, improves user portraits and enables better understanding of users.
data.product_description:
All-channels SCRM helps to Target, Attract, And Acquire Customers
It's the first step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that helps companies reach target groups via multi-touchpoints and acquire customers.
Marketing Automation- Deliver More Win-ready Leads To Sales
It's the second step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that helps companies explore high-value potential customers from their fans/members/database.
Full-channels Customer Relationship Management - Building Closed Loop of Data Marketing
It's the third step of BesChannels SCRM marketing automation that integrates Omni-channel user data, improves user portraits and enables better understanding of users.

initial_reviews.review_title: Only useful in WeChat in China.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Beschannels SCRM?
BesChannel can provide WeChat Marketing Automation, and it is easy to set up.

What do you dislike about Beschannels SCRM?
Only mobile, no PC, no web and very little landing page build.

What problems is Beschannels SCRM solving and how is that benefiting you?
WeChat marketing not only online but also offline.
